title: Did Amy Winehouse have to die at 27? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. She was totally mishandled. It makes me sick. She should have been on BiPolar medication and hospitalized for a much longer time. I blame her family and handlers. It was a total disgrace. Her BiPolar medication was drugs and alcohol. I think a woman that small drinking 2 full bottles of vodka was suicide. And I’ll stick to it.
Yes. As did all the other members of the “27” club. It started with Robert Johnson back at a crossroads in the Mississippi delta…
Yes. She made a pact with the Devil and then had to pay with her life, as did all others of the 27 Club - Wikipedia.
